channel.description: Recent content in review on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: Locking it down
item.description: I finally saved up and bought myself a smart lock at the end of April.

item.title: Mi Box
item.description: I’m a fan of Android TV. While I didn’t blog about it, I ran out and bought a Nexus Player on day 1.

item.title: Huawei Watch Review
item.description: A couple of my mates wanted me to let them know what I thought of the Huawei Watch (hereafter, ‘H’) after upgrading from the Moto 360 (hereafter, 360) and spending some time getting to know the ‘H’.

item.title: I Have The Power
item.description: A while back, I ran across a little project on Kickstarter from a company called SnapPower.
